resources.string: This home page will allow users to decide if they want to browse by playlist, artist, or album. The app uses the Spotify Android API to search for music.
This page will use the Spotify Android API to allow the user to create, and play playlists. It also redirects to the home page.
This page will use the Spotify Android API. This screen displays artists saved by the User and redirects to the home page.
This page displays albums saved by the User and redirects to the home page.
